caption: Create container to get coordinate from address from Mapbox

AJd.caption: This specific workflow action uses Geocoding from Mapbox. You may only use responses from the Mapbox Geocoding API in conjunction with a Mapbox map. It is their policy. If you need something else, another geocoding vendor can be implemented for you, get in touch with me (plugin maker).
AJd.name: _you_may_only_use_responses_from_the_geocoding_api_in_conjunction_with_a_mapbox_map._it_is_their_policy._if_you_need_something_else,_it_can_be_custom_created_for_you.

AJi.caption: Query container ID
AJi.doc: Create a normal group in the page and give it an ID, then write this ID here. It will become the input where the user will type the address.
AJi.name: query_container
